original_title: Sri Lanka’s stocks edge up in mid day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s shares edge up in mid day trade on Thursday, Colombo Stock Exchange data showed.
The main All Share Price Index was up 0.29 percent or 33,78 points to 11,665.75, while the most liquid index S&P SL20 was up 0.35 percent or 12.05 points to 3,460.01
Gainers during mid day trade were Commercial Bank, Sampath Bank and Hatton National Bank. (Colombo/Aug10/2023)
